Yell.text: Screaming at hedgehogs makes them scared and harmless

Dialog_FarmerPhrase_2.text: - Ima all out of booze so I need a few bucks.

Dialog_GoatPhrase_2.text: - What does it have to do with me?

Dialog_FarmerPhrase_3.text: - I'm gonna sell ya sweety, on the market!

WinText.text: Congratulations! You've managed to save your life and left the farmer no other choice but to sober up.

LoseText.text: Your life was exchanged for three crates of very cheap and extremely strong alcohol. What a miserable fate.
